7.19b

GENERAL

  • Buyback respawn time penalty changed from +25% of remaining time to +25s always
  • Level 2 XP requirement changed from 200 to 230 (in a scenario where Team A gets 2 melee denies per wave, and team B gets 1 melee deny per wave: Team A wave requirement for level 2 increases from 2 waves to 3 waves. Team B wave requirement remains at 3 waves. Total XP needed for other levels unchanged.)
  • Glyph is now on cooldown until the 3 minute timer in-game

ITEMS

STOUT SHIELD
  • Damage block for melee heroes increased from 18 to 20
RING OF AQUILA
  • Bonus damage reduced from 10 to 7
MEKANSM
  • Heal increased from 250 to 275
GUARDIAN GREAVES
  • Heal increased from 250 to 275
URN OF SHADOWS
  • Heal rate reduced from 35 to 30
SPIRIT VESSEL
  • Heal rate reduced from 35 to 30
  • Movement speed bonus reduced from 30 to 20
SCYTHE OF VYSE
  • Manacost increased from 100 to 250
PHASE BOOTS
  • Speed bonus on ranged heroes reduced from 16% to 13%
  • Instant turn rate is now a melee only feature

HEROES

ALCHEMIST
GREEVIL'S GREED
  • Greevil's Greed bounty rune multiplier rescaled from 3.5x to 2/2.5/3/3.5x
BLOODSEEKER
BLOODRAGE
  • Bloodrage heal rate reduced from 19/21/23/25% to 16/19/22/25%
BROODMOTHER
  • Base agility reduced by 3
CHEN
PENITENCE
  • Penitence duration reduced from 8 to 5/6/7/8
CLINKZ
  • Base strength reduced by 2
CRYSTAL MAIDEN
CRYSTAL NOVA
  • Crystal Nova manacost increased from 130/140/150/160 to 130/145/160/175
DARK WILLOW
SHADOW REALM
  • Shadow Realm damage reduced from 120/200/280/360 to 90/180/270/360
CURSED CROWN
  • Cursed Crown cast point increased from 0.1 to 0.2
DROW RANGER
  • Base agility reduced from 26 to 19 (base damage unchanged)
  • Agility gain increased from 1.9 to 2.2
  • Base attack animation time improved from 0.7 to 0.65
ENCHANTRESS
  • Base movement speed reduced by 15
GYROCOPTER
  • Base agility reduced by 5 (base damage and armor unchanged)
HUSKAR
  • Base damage reduced from 42-51 to 40-45
TALENTS
  • Level 10 Talent increased from +175 Health to +225
IO
SPIRITS
  • Spirits cooldown from 20/18/16/14 to 26/22/18/14
TALENTS
  • Level 10 Talent reduced from +25% XP to +20%
MIRANA
TALENTS
  • Level 15 Talent reduced from +100 Leap Attack Speed to +80
NATURE'S PROPHET
  • Base damage reduced by 3
NECROPHOS
  • Agility rescaled from 15 + 1.2 to 12 + 1.3
  • Base movement speed reduced by 5
PHANTOM LANCER
TALENTS
  • Level 25 Talent reduced from -7s Doppelganger CD to -6s
SILENCER
ARCANE CURSE
  • Arcane Curse manacost increased from 75/95/115/135 to 105/115/125/135
SPECTRE
SPECTRAL DAGGER
  • Spectral Dagger linger duration reduced from 2 to 1
DISPERSION
  • Dispersion max reflection range reduced from 1000 to 700
DESOLATE
  • Desolate single hero range check increased from 325 to 375
TINY
TREE GRAB
  • Tree Grab manacost increased from 20/30/40/50 to 50
AVALANCHE
  • Avalanche cooldown increased from 20/19/18/17 to 23/21/19/17
URSA
OVERPOWER
  • Overpower manacost increased from 45/55/65/75 to 75
VENGEFUL SPIRIT
WAVE OF TERROR
  • Wave of Terror cooldown increased from 10 to 16/14/12/10
WEAVER
THE SWARM
  • The Swarm manacost increased from 70/80/90/100 to 110
WRAITH KING
WRAITHFIRE BLAST
  • Wraithfire Blast cooldown increased from 11/10/9/8 to 14/12/10/8
